name: Booking Calendar Autofill
author: Stuart A. Thompson

sections.description: This plugin works with the Booking Calendar plugin and autofills fields, like “First Name,” “Last Name,” “Email” and “Phone Number” according to the user who’s currently logged in. Phone number isn’t included in WordPress by default, but is easily added using the “Custom Profile field as a Registration Field” plugin (search Google).
sections.installation:
1. Upload booking-autofill.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. That’s it. The plugin will automatically look for the appropriate fields and insert content if it exists.
sections.faq: If you have questions, visit the plugin URL and comment.
sections.changelog: This is the first version. No changes.
